Hopefully the teacher wouldn't be too mad about being a bit late for class. "Well...minus will try to make the best of the situation." He says with a shrug. "w-wha!?" he stammers before crouching down for balance over the rather quick movements.

12.content:
You are in your favorite wolf girl's dorm room, her coffee table to be precise. After a tough week at school, you decided to wind down when you got an invitation to Luna's dorm. Since it's only Friday, you have the rest of the weekend to study so you decided to take her up on the offer.

She let you in to her dorm room about half an hour ago and told you to wait here for a bit. You take this time to look around Luna's room (well as much as you can see from atop the table. It is just as snug as the average dorm room, which still looks gigantic to you. Her floor is fairly clean which is a surprise seeing as the last time you visited you couldn't see the floor over all the garbage and papers. There is a lone cream colored sofa across from the table and a television on the other side of the table. on a nightstand next to the table sits a small incense bottle which permeates with a scent of burning cinnamon despite being unlit. The television keeps you entertained for so long, but eventually you begin to wonder what is taking her so long. Just as you think of getting up, the door knob slowly creaks and Luna enters the room with two six packs of beer.

"Is that for tonight?" Chez inquires. Luna walks towards the kitchen with a slight smirk on her face as the sound of cans shuffling echoes into the room. "Maybe~" Luna replies happily. "Maybe always means yes when it comes to you and alcohol" Chez retorts. Luna returns to the room and approaches the sofa as she says, "You know me too well, Chez". Luna then leans towards Chez with a grin and sings"Or dooo youuu?". "Do you even know what I have planned for tonight" she purrs. Chez is slightly unbalanced by Luna's hot breath blowing on him and by her question of the night. "I hope you didn't take advantage of my caring for you as an invitation to get me into trouble" Chez says.

"Moi, get you into trouble? Never" Luna mocks as she puts a hand on her head to be dramatic. "I just wanted to invite a good friend over so we can have a fun time tonight" And what more fun could we have than...

1.) A nice night with just the two of us. Luna and Chez solo.
2.) A little party with my friends. Luna has invited two friends over to party with them.
3.) A big party to blow off some steam. Luna is going to a big party and she is bringing Chez with her.

"I have my own problems to deal with right now so your amnesia will have to wait"

         The clock read 9:15 a.m. when a chill went down Lenne's spine, she was going to be late for class. Lenne hurriedly runs to her dresser to pick out some clothes to change into and throws them on the bed. "I can't believe I overslept on chemistry day", Lenne says while despreately taking her clothes off to change. her frantic speech and movements catch Chez off guard almost as much as her nude form before him. Lenne quickly grabs a pair of red panties, a green uniform skirt, and a white blouse and is able to put them on in record time. Her collar is tied off with a large red bow as she uses her tail to grab a pair of socks up off the bed. Within the same minute of realizing she is late, Lenne is able to get fully clothed and run to the kitchen to grab a premade breakfast before rushing out the door, barely grabbing her key and backpack before her footsteps are heard tapping down the hallway.

         Chez sits down in a strange mix of emotions, wonder at how he ended up in this room, curiosity at the differences between him and other mice, admiration for Lenne's ability to get ready so quickly, and a bit of embarrassment for the split second he saw her nude form. Chez's thoughts are interrupted by a low growl in his stomach, "I'm sure she won't mind if I grab something to eat" he thinks. Ches scales down the side of the bed and enters the kitchen area. Unlike Luna's dorm, Lenne's dorm is not modified to be "Chez accessible" which means that he is going to have a rough time scaling the kitchen counters.

         "I will never take my convienence for granted again", Chez sighs as he looks around for a way to get up the counter. Chez finds an open cabinet drawer and begins clinging tightly to the side of the drawer before jumping from knob to knob to the top. Chez nearly slips off, but he manages to grab the counter edge and roll onto the countertop. Out of breath, Chez lies back and lazily looks around to see what his options are. "Banana, orange, half of a cinnamon roll, and some water in the sink", Chez analyses before walking towards the cinnamon roll. It wan't the healthies or the most tasty breakfast, but Chez had to get something in him before he recounted his steps from last night. The cinnamon roll was cold and a bit tough, but definitely edible and better than digging through the garbage. After eating at the cinnamon roll, Chez makes his way to the banana, thinking about how to peel it at his size. Before he can dig into the fruit, a door creaks open, "Back already", Chez thinks, "Or did it really take that long to climb up here"?.
1312.title: Gotta go Class

choices: The two decide to go and find out what happened
Change to another one of Luna's friends
134.content:
A small grunt escapes Chez's body as he slowly twists his sleeping form to the side. "urghh..." he mutters in a subconscious state over the odd feeling that his bed was producing. Last he remembered, his bed was soft and completely still while he rested upon it. This time however it was much more warmer than usual, as if the mattress itself carried some sort of hidden heating device within it. Not only that but the constant up and down movements made it nearly impossible to find an ideal comfy location to rest on. It was almost as if whatever he was lying on was somehow...alive. After a slow rise emerged from underneath his back, Chez's eyes nervously begin to widen as the blurry lights produced from the morning un made contact with his vision. After a few quick blinks and quick rub with his hand, he soon finds himself underneath what looked like a massive sheet of thin blue fabric. "this...doesn't look like Luna's blanket..." Chez mutters as his dread slowly begins to fill up by the alien sight.

Something definitely must've occurred last night. Something so great that it managed to knock the memory right out of the recesses of Chez's skull. Try as he could, there was no recollection of just how he ended up in such a strange place, let alone who's place he was stuck in. With nervous eyes, Chez slowly turns his eyes towards the bottom left side of his area to try and catch a glimpse of who's strange form he was lying on belonged. While investigating the surface below, Chez quickly discovers that it carried traces of light greyish tufts of fur, a clear sign that the person he was resting on wasn't the familiar wolfess at all. At first glance, Chez thought it was probably Dena he was lying on, with her familiar grey colored fur it was a good guest. Though upon further inspection, the odd grey surface carried traces of black spotted patterns randomly all throughout. With a nervous gulp and small nerve-wracking shudder, Chez came to the realization that he was resting upon some complete strangers body, one he had no idea was friendly or a complete sadist.

As Chez's mind was busy coursing with the horrible possibilities that could emerge from such a misunderstanding, to his horror, the sounds of a light moan fused with a small purr emerges from above his position. Before even having time to react, Chez suddenly feels his location beginning to quiver as the wall of fur above him slowly begins to ascend upwards. Unsure just where he was, or the dangers that could arise from standing still, He quickly latches on to the closest tufts of fur as the upper section of the giant form continued it's rise, tossing some of the blue fabric aside in the process. As Chez's eyes were busy gazing upwards from his dangling position, to his shock and utter surprise he final manages to catch a glimpse of the sleeping form.

Rubbing her eyes high above him was the face of a ginormous snow leopard. A soft purr emanates from her throat as she tries her best to rub off the drowsiness lingering upon her orbs as long strands of solid black hair dropped down from her shoulders. "Ngghhh..." she mutters before finally fluttering her eyes slightly to reveal her solid blue eyes. As she gives a few smacks of her lips, her ears soon perk up slightly as her nose wiggled in confusion. With wide eyes, she turns her head about while inhaling quick breaths from her nostrils. It was obvious that she was searching for something, and once her gaze lowered down to her abdomen it was apparent what it was. Chez's eyes grew upon making contact with those of the felines as her orbs begin to grow as well. "uh oh..." Chez mutters under his breath fearing just how this strange massive feline would react to him.

While Chez was certainly expecting some sort of scream or enraged shout to escape from the giantesses mouth, to his surprise nothing came out. The huge feline simply continues on with her gaze as a slightly dumbfounded expression was glued to her face. Seconds of awkward silence soon pass by before the giant leopardess slowly begins to move her upper body. Chez watches absolutely confused as she reaches her arms towards the a table near the bedside to fetch a paper pad and pen. Once the items were recovered, she quickly began to jot something down. From his vantage point, Chez was stupefied beyond belief. Just what was this strange girl doing writing on some pad? Could she possibly have a roommate she didn't want to wake? or maybe she was planning on doing something like blackmailing him!? The thoughts of being in serious trouble causes Chez's mind to swirl out of control before a massive sheet of yellow paper was suddenly displayed right before him.

"huh?" Chez stammers gazing at the paper in utter confusion. As his eyes met with the striped lines of the page, a single sentence was written right in the middle. 'How did you get here?' it said. "How'd I get here?" Chez repeats in a muttered voice before gazing up at the huge leopardess with unease. The huge feline simply gazes down at him with the same expression from earlier, no anger, no fear, just plain curiosity. "Ummm...well." Chez stammers, unsure just how to explain how he ended up in her room. "Well...to tell the truth, I really don't know." He replies with a confused shrug of his shoulders while keeping his eyes glued upon the leopardesses orbs. Immediately, the pad of paper was raised up once more as she begins to write once more. After a second or two she lowers the pad down with a new question written right below the previous one. 'You don't know?' she wrote. "N-No." Chez replies with a shake of his head. "I honestly have no idea how I ended up in your room and...err...well on your body." He stammers as a shade of red emerges on his face. "A-And I'm sorry for intruding!" He nervously adds not wanting to sound like some lecherous fool.

The Leopardess simply nods her head upon hearing the explanation and apology as Chez tilts his head curiously upon her odd actions. "Uhhh...I'm sorry for sounding nosey...but, why aren't you talking?" he asks. "Do you have a roommate who's still asleep?" he adds unsure if there was even more misunderstanding to come. The giant girl shakes her head left and right as if to reply 'No' to the question. "So...no room mates." Chez says in a soft yet still confused tone. It was certainly odd why this giant leopardess didn't talk, until a suddenly realization hit Chez square in the back of the skull. "You...Can't talk...can you?" He asks while taking a step back to get a better look at her looming face. The girl gives another shake of her head as the mystery was soon solved. "Well...that explains the paper and writing." Chez says as the girl nods with his words. Despite meeting in a rather awkward encounter, it did seem like this massive leopardess was rather friendly towards Chez, posing no ill intentions whatsoever. Quite a surprise, especially considering that she was a feline.

"Errr...Well, I'm sorry again for somehow ending up in your room." Chez says as the leopardess nods her head in acceptance. "My name's Chez." Chez adds while mustering a friendly smile up at the giantess. The Leopardess manages to return one back as she once again begins to write on the paper. Soon the paper was lowered once more before Chez with a single word written. 'Mina'.
134.title: The Silent Leopardess

135.content:
As the morning rays of light begin to emerge out the nearby window, Chez lets loose a long irritated groan from the sudden brightness. Taking hint of the morning call, he slowly begins to rise up from his rest before letting out an audibly long yawn. "Ah man..." he mutters while scratching his side as his eyes were slowly trying to adjust to his surroundings. Last he remembered, His good friend Luna insisted on him going out with her to a party of a fellow dorm mate. Being tiny in size, and fearful of her so called ideas of fun, Chez was hesitant at first. However after a couple minutes of pleading, followed by a simple grip of his tail, he and Luna were soon off to the party. With loud music playing, and tons of huge students chatting amongst themselves, Chez ultimately decided to go with the flow of the entertainment. After all that though, everything became a blur.

"Sheesh, what a night." he mumbles as his ears continued to pound slightly from the tunes played last night. "Wouldn't you say so Luna?" he asks while turning his head to the side. To his surprise and upmost confusion, Chez soon finds himself resting upon a large plain sized purple blanket. Quite the oddity, considering that Luna's was that of dark blue. "Luna?" Chez calls out in a meek voice. "since when did you..." A startled gasp soon escapes him as he looks to the right to notice a completely new layout of the room. It didn't take too long to finally piece everything together. Shivers soon began to spread about his body as he slowly turns his head to gaze upon a massive body shaped form resting underneath the sheets.

While being stuck in these circumstances weren't so bad with Luna's friends, with a completely new student it was an entirely different story. Here he was, clueless of how he arrived within this strange room, belonging to this unknown being underneath the covers. Carefully, he begins to rise up from the sheets below and slowly try to make his way to the side of the bed. Maybe if he was lucky, he'd be able to make it out without this person knowing. Just as he was about to take his first steps however, a low groan soon emanates from the middle of the bed as the surface beneath him begins to shake about.

Immediately, he crouches down to grip a good fold of the blanket as the whole area begins to shift about. In seconds, the huge form under the sheets begins to stir about as the fabric covering them starts to slip downwards to reveal their true appearance. Chez's mouth nearly drops down completely agape as he gazes upon the huge being in front of him. A ginormous sized light brown lioness was stretching her hands skywards as long strands of crimson hair fell between her arms. The huge feline seemed to be wearing a simple t-shirt with some sort of logo in the front Chez couldn't identify with. After the lioness finishes up with her stretch a great sigh escapes her mouth as she soon opens her golden orbs to look about drowsily.

Shockingly though, upon gazing about, her eyes soon manage to lock right down towards Chez's small form. Petrified, Chez could do nothing more than stare up at the huge feline as he was crouched down against the blanket. Having absolutely no idea who this catgirl was, and finding his escape thwarted by the close distance to her, it seemed he was completely at her mercy. After a second or two of silence, the lioness soon speaks up.
135.title: Thrown to the lions den

The two have the day off
1351.content:
"h-huh?" Chez stammers, utterly taken aback by the words that escaped this huge lioness's mouth. "Come on, you heard me." The lioness replies with a light giggle as she moves her right hand to gently pinch Chez's right ear. "Di you sleep well?" She asks once more. "E-Errr..." Chez stutters, completely flabbergasted by this odd situation. 'just what DID happen last night?' he thinks to himself before replying. "I-I slept good." "That's great." The lioness replies with a purr as she soon kneels downwards before Chez with both arms crossed under her chin. "Wouldn't want my little mousey boy to be uncomfy." She states in an oddly amorous yet affectionate tone.

As the huge lioness's head lies down in front of him, Chez takes a few steps back shocked from her strange behavior. "E-Ermm...i'm sorry to ask, but just what happened last night?" Chez stutters, lightly rubbing the side of his head as the small migraine continued to persist. "Oh! you don't remember?" she asks, giving off a surprised expression. "Not really..." Chez answers with a slow shake of his head. The strange lioness giggles once more as she gazes at Chez with eyes half open.

"Remember? You and Luna made your way to the party?" She asks with a light smile on her face. "I...do remember that." Chez nods his head. "Well...Luna ended up getting a bit...well tipsy from a few glasses and left you on the drink counter as she rushed to the crowd." "Figures..." Chez says with a light roll of his eyes. Knowing Luna all too well, this was no surprise at all. "As you were waiting about, some drunken Coyote girl was trying to pick a fight with me." She continues, rolling her eyes as the memories seemed to irritate her. "Though...luckily, you managed to catch sight of the whole thing and managed to knock down a cup of beer on her without being seen." a small chuckle escapes as she gives off a long content sigh. "She ended up storming off before you peeked out asking if I was alright."

"Really?" Chez asks, surprised and taken aback by the events taking place last night. "Then what happened?" "Well...we got to know each other a bit more at the party Chez." The lioness continues onward as her smile seemed to grow. "Soon enough, everyone was either passed out or making their way out as we were the only two still a-okay. Though...you did manage to accidentally take a sip of some alcohol, mistaking it for water." She adds. "That explains alot." Chez says with a nod, only now realizing what was causing his headache. "So...I took you to my dorm room for some shut eye, and here we are." The Lioness finishes up with a small chuckle.

"Wow...can't believe all that happened Last night..." Chez mumbles looking down still taken aback from the story. "Well..you did take a pretty big drink." The lioness retorts with a small laugh that Chez couldn't help but join in. "Ermm..I'm sorry to ask, but what's your name again?" he asks, almost abashed for even forgetting the name of this friendly feline. "You really were out of it." The lioness lets out a small playful chortle. "it's Griselda... or Elda for short." "Well Elda...thanks for everything you've done for me." Chez states with a smile. "Like wise Chez." Elda replies back with a nod. "now..."

Whenever people first met him they always asked Chez one of two things... Today however we're only going to answer one of them.
"So what's it like being so small?" was the question, the mouse couldn't remember how many times he'd been asked but it was certainly more than a few... and of course there was typically some kind of snarky remark about probably being a pervert which came after it too. Chez through rolling his eyes would always respond with a "It's about what you would expect... everyday life just smaller." but that was really anything but the truth, that was a manufactured response which he had learned would stop further prying questions as in reality life so small was anything but normal.
Take today for example. Minding his own business at his desk Chez was sent hurtling through the air toward an unknown fate whenever a class mate of his shook it without even noticing.

Chez awoke to a bell ringing in the background, the sounds of voices from all around but he couldn't see anything. His heart pounded faster and faster as his mind raced with horrible ideas of what could have happened, and whether or not he was somehow blinded until he saw a white tube partially concealed in the ground, his heart calming slightly as he with a sigh realized the truth of the matter.
Vaguely recalling his last memories of falling through the air Chez guessed that he had landed in some sort of bag or carrying case, his eyes slowly beginning to adapt to his new surroundings as shapes and vague colours became apparent in his surroundings.

Reds, blues, scissors, comb and some tubes of what seemed like sweets all stuck in position by what looked like a pile of clothes which had been pushed down to the bottom of the bag... further looking around he could see something shiny sticking out of the clothing though it looked rather... phallic in nature, Chez having a fairly good idea of what it was without looking too hard at it. It's not like it was common to see them but he had seen them from time to time tucked away in bags and lockers as he was making the rounds having fallen into someone's bag or lunch... it looked fairly expensive, obviously being a squirting dildo of some kind though it was unlikely it had anything in it... it was probably being hidden here to keep it away from parents or roommates for a limited time, probably why the classmate was so careless as to knock into Chez's desk actually.

The room shook as the bag was dropped on a surface, the sound of fingers fumbling with the fabric and zipper warning Chez that it was about to open and if the mouse had learned anything it was not to let someone catch him in their personal effects even if it was a mistake or a misunderstanding, and the fact that there was a dildo in here made the invasion of privacy even more dire... with no clue who he was dealing with or how they'd react Chez found himself with a couple of options.

info.brief_description: How will the mouse boy survive in a school full of giantesses?
info.description:
Hey. If you like this story, please drop me a PM to let me know what characters/actions you would like to see in this story.

         In the world of anthros, animals come in many shapes and sizes, but none are as different as Chez the mouseboy. While some of his classmates range from 4 to 6 feet, Chez is only 6 inches tall. His everyday school life is an adventure wrought with dangers and excitement. In this story you will get to guide Chez (and occasionally his friends and enemies) throughout his everyday life as a student of all female Koda High.

Characters
Chez: The mouse boy himself. Raised by the mother of his closest friend, Luna, Chez has always felt out of place among the world of giants, but he has adjusted to get around the house and his schools campus with little risk. After being home schooled for most of his life, Koda High has agreed to accept him and work with his "handicap". Once he arrives, he quickly realizes that Koda High is an all girls school and the only reason he was accepted was because the staff did not have to fear a male of his size getting the girls into trouble, but who is going to keep the girls from getting him in trouble?

Luna: A large silver haired wolf girl. Chez' childhood friend and voice of reason. Growing up with Chez, she became as adjusted to living with a little friend as he learned to live with giants. She is very perceptive and outgoing. Even though she cares for Chez, she isn't above teasing him and loves to play on his fear of getting swallowed a bit too much.

Dena: A grey haired rabbit girl. Always full of excitement and energy, she spends her free time partying and training for her track team. She never seems to study and shows up to class only when required. She is often Luna's wing girl when they go out partying and she loves to flirt with the guys, including Chez. Luna's influence has rubbed off on her and she now teases Chez, not with the thread of eating him, but with the threat of getting crushed under her rump. She would never hurt Chez intentionally, at least not when she's sober.

Meg: An orange furred vixen. Self conscious and and a bit of a sadist, she thrives on attention and power. She is the class president of Luna's grade and likes to keep the girls looking prim and proper. She is always up to date on the latest gossip and loves to complain about every little inconvenience in her life. When Chez arrived, she felt threatened by all the attention he was getting but quickly got over it after holding him in her hand and realizing she could end his existence at any time and thinks of him like a bug or nusance. Around the other girls, she tries to keep her sadistic persona in check, but with Chez the temptation can get quite overwhelming to do some violent things to him.

Lane: A yellow cheetah girl with black spots. On both the cheer leading squad, basketball team, and some of the highest grades of her class, Lane is overachieving incarnate. Over thinking and focused, she often dissects things a bit too far when the answer is simply in front of her face. She is one of the tallest girls at Koda high standing above some instructors, but despite this she tries to make herself appear more "petite" and "feminine" when she can. She keeps her paws in particularly good shape as they are quite sensitive despite her regular workouts. Instead of partying, she fancies a long soak in a hot tub or a nice foot massage.

Katherine: A pink haired cat girl. Sly and mischievous, she is a master of pranks and practical jokes alike. She loves to plays games whether they be video or board and she is quite good at them without having to cheat (much). She joined culinary club to learn how to cook after constant cravings for new and exotic foods. She was immediately taken by Chez from the moment she laid eyes on him and now keeps a diary of the many ways she can tease, play, and even eat him for her pleasure. Constantly tells Chez she would love to have him for lunch, but no one knows if she is joking or serious, not even herself.

Dawn: A brown haired deer girl (doe). Meg's friend and cohort. Almost always seen with Meg outside of track meets to the point others call them Siamese twins. She wears glasses and would be practically blind without them, the Gentle and naive, she follows the words of others without a second thought. She is on the track team with Dena and the two frequently talk in between practice sessions. She finds Chez adorable and treats him like a child or a pet instead of a fellow student, but it isn't out of maliciousness, she just can't help herself.

Nancy: A light brown haired sheep girl. Full of devotion to her friends and her religion, Nancy spends most of her time in an outfit that resembles a nun's habit (even though her worshiped religion is never outright stated). Patient and understanding, Nancy is quite popular on campus as a shoulder to lean on and good listener to her friends problems (and gossip). She is not used to being around boys after living with four sisters and going to a private all girls school. She is easily flustered and embarrassed by boys, including Chez, and she is quite impulsive in her flustered state which may lead to unintentional injury to herself and the boy in question.

You are not limited to just these characters, but I fleshed them out a bit to let readers know what they are in for in chapters featuring these characters. You can make any other characters you want from students to instructors, just try to spread out the species a bit (we don't need 10 foxes and 20 wolves).

ANYTHING CAN HAPPEN
-Vore, crush, scat, full tour digestions, toilet play, aware, unaware. It's all good.
-The only thing I will ask you to stay away from is further size alteration (additional shrink or growth), and introducing other characters that are small like Chez.

There are very few rules for this interactive.
-Be grammatically correct (if an entry is too unreadable, it will be deleted)
-You CAN make an excuse for someone being out of character (drunk, dared to do something, or frustrated beyond their limit)
-Do not write an entry if you are going to avoid the choice made (If you write a choice for an entry that states "Chez gets eaten" don't write something like "Chez is about to get eaten, but then he escapes)
-Chez is supposed to be the male focus and the ONLY MALE at Koda High. You can still introduce males outside of the campus or as visitors.
-Try to flesh out your ideas and don't make an entry one sentence
